description: This table contains the history of a claim's outgoing 837 exports and encounter reporting data.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EXPORT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The export type for this row of export history.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Reprice and Export-only Claims


Subrogation Claims


AP Claims Ad Hoc


3rd-Party Pricing


Split Risk


Crossover


Paid Claims Encounter Reporting


External Pricing


Pre-Pay Audit


Pre-Pay Audit: Update

columns.name: EXPORT_SUBTYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The export subtype for this row of export history, if there is a subtype for the export.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Create or Update Crossover


Cancel Crossover

columns.name: EXPORT_BATCH_PAYER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the payer record that this claim used when batched for the export. This is typically the payer for the coverage used to pay the claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_RUN_IDENT
columns.description: The claim run ID that processed this claim during claim export batching.

columns.name: CLAIM_RECON_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Claim Reconciliation record that tracks the encounter and reconciliation data for this row.

columns.name: EXPORT_DEST_PAYER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the payer record that this claim export was sent to. This is the payer used to drive the destination payer loop on the outgoing 837.

columns.name: EXPORT_CEV_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the most recent claim values record created for this row's outgoing claim export data.
